title: Can I use my phone as a mobile Wi-Fi hotspot and access the Internet from another device using my phone's data connection?
answer:
Yes. To activate this, turn on the Wi-Fi hotspot on your phone as follows: 

 Choose Settings > Wireless & networks > More > Tethering & portable hotspot > Portable Wi-Fi hotspot. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109379)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109380)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109381)

 After a device connects to your phone over Wi-Fi, you can access the Internet from that device using your phone's mobile data connection. 

 To set the hotspot name and encryption mode, choose Settings > Wireless & networks > More > Tethering & portable hotspot > Portable Wi-Fi hotspot settings. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109382)
